worlds.gregs.hestia.game.api.region

Class RegionBuilder

  • worlds.gregs.hestia.game.api.region.RegionBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegionBuilderSystem

    public class RegionBuilder

    RegionBuilder Toolset to dynamically modify region maps Uses exact chunk coordinates, not local

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RegionBuilder()
      RegionBuilder Toolset to dynamically modify region maps Uses exact chunk coordinates, not local

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(int chunkX,
                int chunkY,
                int plane,
                int toChunkX,
                int toChunkY,
                int toPlane,
                int rotation)

        Sets a single chunk at chunkX, chunkY, plane to the chunk at toChunkX, toChunkY, toPlane with rotation

        Parameters:
        chunkX - The x position of the chunk to replace
        chunkY - The y position of the chunk to replace
        plane - The z position of the chunk to replace
        toChunkX - The x position of the replacement chunk
        toChunkY - The y position of the replacement chunk
        toPlane - The z position of the replacement chunk
        rotation - The rotation of the new chunk

      • set

        public void set(int chunkX,
                int chunkY,
                int plane,
                int toChunkX,
                int toChunkY,
                int toPlane,
                int width,
                int height,
                int rotation)

        Sets an area widthxheight of chunks with rotation

        Parameters:
        chunkX - The x position of the chunk to replace
        chunkY - The y position of the chunk to replace
        plane - The z position of the chunk to replace
        toChunkX - The x position of the replacement chunk
        toChunkY - The y position of the replacement chunk
        toPlane - The z position of the replacement chunk
        width - The number of chunks to replace on the x axis
        height - The number of chunks to replace on the y axis
        rotation - The rotation of the new chunks (Rotation is applied to the whole area)

      • set

        public void set(int regionId,
                int toRegionId,
                int rotation)

        Set's the whole region regionId to toRegionId with rotation

        Parameters:
        regionId - The old region
        toRegionId - The new region
        rotation - How much to rotate the region

      • clear

        public void clear(int chunkX,
                  int chunkY,
                  int plane)

        Clears the chunk at chunkX, chunkY, plane

        Parameters:
        chunkX - The x position of the chunk to remove
        chunkY - The y position of the chunk to remove
        plane - The z position of the chunk to remove

      • clear

        public void clear(int chunkX,
                  int chunkY,
                  int plane,
                  int width,
                  int height)

        Clears an area of widthxheight chunks

        Parameters:
        chunkX - The x position of the chunk to replace
        chunkY - The y position of the chunk to replace
        plane - The z position of the chunk to replace
        width - The number of chunks to replace on the x axis
        height - The number of chunks to replace on the y axis

      • clear

        public void clear(int regionId)

        Clears the whole region

        public void reset(int chunkX,
                  int chunkY,
                  int plane)

        Reset the chunk at chunkX, chunkY, plane

        Parameters:
        chunkX - The x position of the chunk to remove
        chunkY - The y position of the chunk to remove
        plane - The z position of the chunk to remove

      • reset

        public void reset(int chunkX,
                  int chunkY,
                  int plane,
                  int width,
                  int height)

        Resets an area of widthxheight to it's original chunks

        Parameters:
        chunkX - The x position of the chunk to replace
        chunkY - The y position of the chunk to replace
        plane - The z position of the chunk to replace
        width - The number of chunks to replace on the x axis
        height - The number of chunks to replace on the y axis

      • reset

        public void reset(int regionId)

        Resets the whole region

      • build

        public boolean build(int regionId)

        Applies the changes to the region regionId

        Parameters:
        regionId - The region to apply the changes too
        Returns:
        Success

      • reset

        public void reset()

        Resets the builder
